QuestData.Title: A Lesson in Bravery
QuestData.Description: <Master Shang speaks to his shepherd boy.>$b$bFrancis, you need to show bravery! You have everything it takes to make a great shepherd, except the courage to face your fears!$b$b<He looks over to you.>$b$bYou, stranger. You helped the rest of my family. Francis is like a second son to me.$b$bShow my apprentice what it means to lack fear. Use this rope to lasso and defeat one of the great white hawks above us.$b$b<Shang points to the sky, looks at Francis, and leaves.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Rancher's Lariat to lasso and defeat a Great White Plainshawk.
QuestData.CompletionText: You lack fear. I can sense it in your heart.
QuestData.RewardText: Francis has taken longer than I expected to become an effective shepherd. We all go through these phases... my son Liang was weak once, too. As was I.$b$bBut he will learn. It is the Thunderfoot way.
